com.ami.mse.ucms.db.manager.comment

Interface CommentsManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommentsManagerImpl

    public interface CommentsManager
    The Interface containing methods that process instance of Comments. There are methods for saving and updating the instance. Also extraction of existing one or list of all existing.
    Author:
    Tony

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Comments> findAll()
      Find all existing Comments.
      List<Comments> findAllForTask(Assignment assignment)
      Find all Comments by given Assignment.
      Comments findById(int id)
      Find instance of Comments by it id.
      void save(Comments comments)
      Saves the instance of Comments
      Comments update(Comments comments)
      Update the instance of Comments.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        void save(Comments comments)
        Saves the instance of Comments
        Parameters:
        comments - the instance of Comments that will be saved in data base

      • update

        Comments update(Comments comments)
        Update the instance of Comments. If the instance not exist it will be saved.
        Parameters:
        comments - the instance of Comments that will be updated or saved

      • findAll

        List<Comments> findAll()
        Find all existing Comments.
        Returns:
        the list of Comments

      • findById

        Comments findById(int id)
        Find instance of Comments by it id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the searched Comments
        Returns:
        the searched comments or null if it's not exist

      • findAllForTask

        List<Comments> findAllForTask(Assignment assignment)
        Find all Comments by given Assignment.
        Parameters:
        assignment - the assignment for witch we search comments
        Returns:
        the list of comments for the given assignment or null if there is none comments
